item.title: Acquiring Knowledge
item.description: Once we’re graduate from school we are expected to learn some and rightfully knowledgeable on aÂ certain subject we’re pursuing. Learning broad subject in schools or books doesn’t mean we really understand it. Once my teacher said that the best way to understand is to teach someone the subject that we want to master. Teaching the same subject make her easily solve many problem variants, that makes sense. Repetition is key.
